channel.title: [718+] How to edit bank name (NOOB FRIENDLY)
channel.description:
[center][size=18pt][b]HOW TO CHANGE BANK NAME 718+ (Mainly Matrix Bases)[/b][/size][/center]
[size=12pt]Difficulty: Not even 1/10 Skill(s) Required: Copying and Pasting & Using the Find button...[/size]
[b]#1[/b] - Go to [b]Source>src>com>rs>game>player>Bank.java[/b] [img]http://gyazo.com/f6c86a74e607f053544452106abef399.png[/img]
[b]#2[/b] - Search (Ctrl + F) for [b]player.getInterfaceManager().sendInterface(762);[/b] [img]http://gyazo.com/623d7987ac185c17e6612a5190bd9d86.png[/img]
[b]#3[/b] - Below it, add this line: [code] player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(762, 47, "Bank of "+Settings.SERVER_NAME);[/code]
[b]#4[/b] - Compile and run source.
[b]Congratulations![/b] You have now changed the bank name to yours! (If not then change the server's name in [b]src>com>rs>Settings.java[/b]) :)

item.title: [718+] How to edit bank name (NOOB FRIENDLY)
item.dc:creator: @Jayden2 Jayden.
item.description:
@Jayden2 wrote:

pax magenz:

Settings.Java -> Server Name -> Your Server Name Here -> BOMB!

Dafuq.

OT: good job, helpful to a lot off people.

Read full topic

item.title: [718+] How to edit bank name (NOOB FRIENDLY)
item.dc:creator: @Haydnz1234 Haydnz1234
item.description:
@Haydnz1234 wrote:

[center][size=18pt]HOW TO CHANGE BANK NAME 718+ (Mainly Matrix Bases)[/size][/center]

[size=12pt]Difficulty: Not even 1/10
Skill(s) Required: Copying and Pasting & Using the Find button…[/size]

#1 - Go to Source>src>com>rs>game>player>Bank.java

f6c86a74e607f053544452106abef399.png1024×314

#2 - Search (Ctrl + F) for player.getInterfaceManager().sendInterface(762);

#3 - Below it, add this line:

		player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(762, 47, "Bank of "+Settings.SERVER_NAME);

#4 - Compile and run source.

Congratulations! You have now changed the bank name to yours! (If not then change the server’s name in src>com>rs>Settings.java)

Read full topic
item.source: [718+] How to edit bank name (NOOB FRIENDLY)
